languages.text: {n}Дознаватель дотрагивается до разных мест на теле заговорщика, холодно комментируя свои {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}колдовские{/g} воздействия на корчащегося человека. Несколько раз заставив кровь пленника бурлить и леденеть, а сердце — переключаться между остановкой и тахикардией, Хейнрикс наконец-то отходит в сторону.{/n}

{n}The Interrogator touches different spots on the prisoner's body, coldly commenting on the effects his {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}sorcery{/g} is having on the writhing man. He makes his blood boil, then freeze, then boil again. He arrests his heart, makes it beat rapidly, then back again. At last, Heinrix steps away.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Дознаватель дотрагивается до разных мест на теле заговорщика, холодно комментируя свои {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}колдовские{/g} воздействия на корчащегося человека. Несколько раз заставив кровь пленника бурлить и леденеть, а сердце — переключаться между остановкой и тахикардией, Хейнрикс наконец-то отходит в сторону.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Interrogator touches different spots on the prisoner's body, coldly commenting on the effects his sorcery is having on the writhing man. He makes his blood boil, then freeze, then boil again. He makes his heart go from an arrest to a rapidly increasing rate and back. At last, Heinrix steps away.{/n}

{n}The Interrogator touches different spots on the prisoner's body, coldly commenting on the effects his sorcery is having on the writhing man. He makes his blood boil, then freeze, then boil again. He makes his heart go from an arrest to a rapidly increasing rate and back. At last, Heinrix steps away.{/n}

He makes his blood boil, then freeze, then boil again. He arrests his heart, makes it beat rapidly, then back again. At last, Heinrix steps away.{/n}

{n}The Interrogator touches different spots on the prisoner's body, coldly commenting on the effects his {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}sorcery{/g} is having on the writhing man. He makes his blood boil, then freeze, then boil again. He arrests his heart, makes it beat rapidly, then back again. At last, Heinrix steps away.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El interrogador toca varios puntos del cuerpo del prisionero, comentando con frialdad los efectos que provoca su {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}hechicería{/g} en el hombre que se retuerce frente a él. Hace que su sangre hierva, luego la congela y después la hierve de nuevo. Detiene su corazón, hace que palpite desbocado y lo detiene una vez más. Finalmente, Heinrix se retira.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator touches different spots on the prisoner's body, coldly commenting on the effects his {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}sorcery{/g} is having on the writhing man. He makes his blood boil, then freeze, then boil again. He arrests his heart, makes it beat rapidly, then back again. At last, Heinrix steps away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El interrogador toca varios puntos del cuerpo del prisionero, comentando con frialdad los efectos que provoca su hechicería en el hombre que se retuerce frente a él. Hace que su sangre hierva, luego la congela y después la hierve de nuevo. Detiene su corazón, hace que palpite desbocado y lo detiene una vez más. Finalmente, Heinrix se retira.{/n}

languages.text: {n}インテロゲイターは囚人の体のあちこちに触れて、自分の{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}魔術{/g}が身動きのとれない男に与えている影響について淡々と述べた。血を沸騰させ、凍らせ、また沸騰させる。心臓を止め、急速に鼓動させ、再び元に戻す。そして最後に、ハインリックスはその場から立ち去る。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator touches different spots on the prisoner's body, coldly commenting on the effects his {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}sorcery{/g} is having on the writhing man. He makes his blood boil, then freeze, then boil again. He arrests his heart, makes it beat rapidly, then back again. At last, Heinrix steps away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}インテロゲイターは囚人の体のあちこちに触れて、自分の魔術が身動きのとれない男に与えている影響について淡々と述べた。血を沸騰させ、凍らせ、また沸騰させる。心臓を止め、急速に鼓動させ、再び元に戻す。そして最後に、ハインリックスはその場から立ち去る。{/n}

languages.text: {n}海因里希用手触碰犯人身体的各个部位。犯人拼命扭动着身躯，而海因里希则毫无感情地讲解他的{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}灵能力量{/g}会对犯人的身体产生什么样的影响。他让犯人的血液沸腾起来，之后将其冻结，之后再次令其沸腾。他让犯人的心脏停止跳动，之后令它狂跳不止，往复循环这个过程。到最后，海因里希走开了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator touches different spots on the prisoner's body, coldly commenting on the effects his {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}sorcery{/g} is having on the writhing man. He makes his blood boil, then freeze, then boil again. He arrests his heart, makes it beat rapidly, then back again. At last, Heinrix steps away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希用手触碰犯人身体的各个部位。犯人拼命扭动着身躯，而海因里希则毫无感情地讲解他的灵能力量会对犯人的身体产生什么样的影响。他让犯人的血液沸腾起来，之后将其冻结，之后再次令其沸腾。他让犯人的心脏停止跳动，之后令它狂跳不止，往复循环这个过程。到最后，海因里希走开了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Interrogator berührt verschiedene Punkte am Körper des Gefangenen und kommentiert kaltherzig die Effekte, die seine {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}Magie{/g} auf den sich windenden Mann hat. Er lässt sein Blut kochen, dann einfrieren, dann wieder kochen. Er lässt sein Herz stehenbleiben, dann schnell schlagen, dann wieder stehenbleiben. Schließlich tritt Heinrix weg.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator touches different spots on the prisoner's body, coldly commenting on the effects his {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}sorcery{/g} is having on the writhing man. He makes his blood boil, then freeze, then boil again. He arrests his heart, makes it beat rapidly, then back again. At last, Heinrix steps away.{/n}

Er lässt sein Blut kochen, dann einfrieren, dann wieder kochen. Er lässt sein Herz stehenbleiben, dann schnell schlagen, dann wieder stehenbleiben. Schließlich tritt Heinrix weg.{/n}

{n}Der Interrogator berührt verschiedene Punkte am Körper des Gefangenen und kommentiert kaltherzig die Effekte, die seine Magie auf den sich windenden Mann hat. Er lässt sein Blut kochen, dann einfrieren, dann wieder kochen. Er lässt sein Herz stehenbleiben, dann schnell schlagen, dann wieder stehenbleiben. Schließlich tritt Heinrix weg.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'interrogateur palpe le prisonnier en divers endroits, tout en décrivant froidement les effets de sa sorcellerie sur l'homme qui se tord de douleur. Son sang entre en ébullition dans ses veines avant de geler pour mieux bouillir à nouveau. Son cœur s'arrête, puis il bat la chamade, et ainsi de suite. Sa besogne terminée, Heinrix recule d'un pas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator touches different spots on the prisoner's body, coldly commenting on the effects his sorcery is having on the writhing man. He makes his blood boil, then freeze, then boil again. He arrests his heart, makes it beat rapidly, then back again. At last, Heinrix steps away.{/n}
